author: kclowes
content: I'm not able to make the rpc call on Monday, but I put up a [draft PR](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/704) for the versioning. The idea is to be able to communicate to clients when we're going to introduce breaking changes to the rpc-compat tests in hive so they can upgrade their rpc methods accordingly. Feel free to comment there if you have any feedback!
